person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: About 200 Burmese students marched briefly from troubled Yangon Institute of Technology in northern Rangoon on Friday towards the University of Yangon six km ( four miles ) away , and returned to their campus , witnesses said .

Let's think step by step.

1. About 200 Burmese students
2. Witnesses (implied, as they are the ones who reported the event)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:

Paragraph: About 200 Burmese students marched briefly from troubled Yangon Institute of Technology in northern Rangoon on Friday towards the University of Yangon six km ( four miles ) away , and returned to their campus , witnesses said .

1. Troubled Yangon Institute of Technology
2. northern Rangoon
3. University of Yangon
4. six km ( four miles ) away (This is not a location per se, but it describes the distance between Yangon Institute of Technology and University of Yangon)

1. Yangon Institute of Technology
2. northern Rangoon
3. University of Yangon

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| Yangon Institute of Technology |
| northern Rangoon |
| University of Yangon |
